author: wn.com
title: 14 October 2015 - Farry congratulates Southern Regional College on achieving Erasmusplus Mobility Charter (Department ...
text: ( Source : Department for Employment and Learning ) Employment and Learning Minister Dr Stephen Farry has congratulated Southern Regional College ( SRC ) for its success in being awarded the prestigious Erasmus + Vocational Education and Training
